description: Try our easy to follow Basic Chicken Stock recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Basic Chicken Stock Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.3kg chicken wings, chopped at the joints

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the chicken, celery, and onion in a large saucepan with 2 litres cold water. Bring just to a boil over high heat. Using a large spoon, skim off any foam that rises to the surface. Reduce the heat to low and add the parsley, thyme, bay leaf, salt, and peppercorns. Partially cover the saucepan. Simmer for at least 1 and up to 3 hours.
Strain the stock into a large bowl. Let stand 10 minutes, then skim the fat from the surface. Use immediately, or cool completely and refrigerate or freeze.
